tool_description: Analyzes shipment data to identify delivery exceptions, delays, and potential issues requiring intervention.

order_id.description: The order identifier to analyze for exceptions

error_messages: Invalid order ID: Provide a valid order identifier that exists in the system.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format for expected_delivery_date.
Missing tracking status: Provide current tracking status from the carrier.
Invalid delivery attempts: Must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Provide order_id, expected_delivery_date, and tracking_status. Optionally include customer_complaints and delivery_attempts for more accurate exception detection. The tool returns exception type and severity level.

has_exception.description: Whether an exception has been detected

exception_type.description: Type of exception (delay, damaged, lost, address_issue, etc.)

recommended_actions.description: List of recommended actions to resolve the exception
